article:
I was flying to New York at night. Suddenly, a storm broke and the plane began to be tossed around.
When I looked _ the plane, I could see that nearly all the passengers were worried and _ The future seemed terrible and many were wondering if they would make it through the storm.
Then I _ saw a little girl. It seemed that the storm meant _ to her. She sat on her seat reading a book. Sometimes she closed her eyes, then she would read again, with no _ or fear in her eyes. When the other passengers were scared half to death, that child was completely _ . I could not believe my eyes.
When the plane finally reached New York, I was not surprised to _ that all the passengers were hurrying to come out. I stopped and spoke to the girl for such a long time. I asked _ she had not been afraid.
The child replied," My daddy is the _ , and he is taking me home.
